text: Harvey Hurd Lord (August 13, 1878 - May 3, 1920) was an American track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. Lord competed in the 400 metres. He placed third in his first-round (semifinals) heat and did not advance to the final. He also competed in the 800 metres, again finishing third in his semifinal heat to not advance to the final. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. title: Harvey Lord
